page.title: 12SERVICES:HINTON CHARTERHOUSE
page.content: THE MAIN SERVICE PROVIDED IN HINTON CHARTERHOUSE IS BY THE{POST OFFICE, WHICH IS SITUATED ON THE MAIN ROAD THROUGH THE VILLAGE. IT IS OPEN FROM MONDAY TO SATURDAY LUNCHTIME, ALTHOUGH THERE IS HALF-DAY CLOSING ON WEDNESDAYS. THE BUSIEST DAYS OF THE WEEK ARE MONDAYS, TUESDAYS AND THURSDAYS, AS THESE ARE THE DAYS WHEN THE VILLAGERS COME TO COLLECT THEIR PENSIONS AND FAMILY ALLOWANCES. THE POST OFFICE IS JUST A SINGLE ROOM IN THE FRONT OF AN ORDINARY HOUSE IN THE STREET, AND HAS BEEN RUN BY THE SAME FAMILY FOR THREE GENERATIONS. AS WELL AS THE POSTAL SERVICES, IT SELLS A SMALL SELECTION OF GREETINGS CARDS AND STATIONERY ITEMS. OPPOSITE THE POST OFFICE, IS A{GARAGE WITH MECHANICAL SERVICING FACILITIES, USED BY BOTH THE A.A. AND THE R.A.C. THIS IS ALSO CLOSED ON WEDNESDAY P.M.
